issue.title: Erratic vehicle behavior when breaks are applied and when accelerating

content.raw:
It was done on a map we made which is composed of a road over a very large area and nothing else.  Could send it over to you if you wanted to check it out.

When it applies the breaks, this is what it is doing:

PB 0.1 | wait 200ms | PB 0.2 | wait 200ms | PB 0.3 | wait 200ms | ... etc .. | PB 1.0 | wait 

So you are suggesting the following:

PB 0.5 | PB 1.0

Correct?

EDIT: now I think you mean:

PB 1.0 | monitor velocity, wait till almost stopped | PB 0.5
